SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id =#{itemId}
and comment_level =#{commentLevel}

SELECT it.id AS itemId, it.item_name AS itemName, it.sell_counts AS sellCounts, img.url AS imgUrl , tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items it LEFT JOIN items_img img ON it.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id ,MIN(price_discount) price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON it.id =tempSpec.item_id WHERE img.is_main = 1
and it.item_name like '%${keywords}%'
order by
sellCounts desc
price asc
itemName asc

SELECT it.id AS itemId, it.item_name AS itemName, it.sell_counts AS sellCounts, img.url AS imgUrl , tempSpec.price_discount AS price FROM items it LEFT JOIN items_img img ON it.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id ,MIN(price_discount) price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec ON it.id =tempSpec.item_id WHERE img.is_main = 1 and it.cat_id =#{catId} order by
sellCounts desc
price asc
itemName asc

SELECT it.id AS itemId, it.item_name AS itemName, img.url AS itemImgUrl, spec.`name` AS specName, spec.id as specId, spec.price_discount AS priceDiscount, spec.price_normal AS priceNormal FROM items_spec spec LEFT JOIN items it ON spec.item_id = it.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT url, item_id FROM items_img WHERE is_main = 1 ) img ON it.id = img.item_id WHERE spec.id IN
#{specId}
